sentences.en: Nor do they aspire to such command themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们自己也不渴望这样的命令。

sentences.en: Mary is ambitious enough to aspire to conversational fluency in Chinese in four months.
sentences.cn: 玛丽雄心很大， 竟立志在四个月里学会用汉语流利地会话。

sentences.en: Men aspire to be able to show off their six packs or their V-shape backs and there's a growing market of slimming pills aimed at men too.
sentences.cn: 男性渴望展示自己的六块腹肌或 V 型后背，针对男性的减肥药市场也在不断增长。
